mapper.select: SELECT B.ENDPOINT , B.P256DH , B.AUTH FROM users A JOIN push_info B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID JOIN alarm_set C ON A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID JOIN schedule D ON C.ALARM_ID = D.ALARM_ID JOIN med_info E ON D.MED_ID = E.MED_ID WHERE A.USER_STATUS = 'Y' AND CURDATE() BETWEEN E.START_DATE AND E.END_DATE AND C.ALARM_TIME BETWEEN CURTIME() - INTERVAL 10 SECOND AND CURTIME() + INTERVAL 10 SECOND GROUP BY B.ENDPOINT, B.P256DH, B.AUTH
